definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Male circumcision is common at birth in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 男嬰出生時行包皮環切術在美國很普遍。

sentences.english: A family dog rescued a newborn boy from the jaws of death.
sentences.chinese: 一隻家養犬把一個新生男嬰從鬼門關救了回來。

sentences.english: The cause of this boy boom has long flummoxed thinkers and scientists.
sentences.chinese: 男嬰潮現象使許多科學家與思考這問題的人抓破頭皮。

sentences.english: In February this year a nine-year-old Chinese schoolgirl gave birth to a baby boy.
sentences.chinese: 今年的2月，一個9歲的中國女學生誕下一男嬰。

sentences.english: After his wife Victoria gave birth to a baby boy in Madrid today.
sentences.chinese: 是他的妻子維多莉亞今天在馬德里誕下一個男嬰之後。

sentences.english: It is one of the most common urogenital congenital anomalies among baby boys.
sentences.chinese: 這是一種最常見的泌尿生殖系統先天性異常中男嬰。

sentences.english: However, before the birth of a baby boy they normally descend into his scrotum .
sentences.chinese: 然而，男嬰在誕生之前，它們通常要下降進入其陰囊。

sentences.english: After the death of Percy's wife, Roxy has to look after both baby boys.
sentences.chinese: 由於珀西妻子的死亡，羅西要同時照顧兩個男嬰。

sentences.english: This one-day-old boy was born in Columbia, Maryland.
sentences.chinese: 上圖是在馬里蘭州哥倫比亞特區出生一天的男嬰。

sentences.english: There were 30 baby girls and 29 baby boys.
sentences.chinese: 研究對象包括30名女嬰和29個男嬰。

sentences.english: It was a very godly home into which this baby boy was born.
sentences.chinese: 經文講述的那個小男嬰，一定是生於一個敬虔的家庭。

sentences.english: Inside, just visible, was a baby boy, fast asleep.
sentences.chinese: 毛毯裏面，一個男嬰正甜甜地睡着。

sentences.english: C-sections are also 20 percent more common for males.
sentences.chinese: 剖宮產對於男嬰的普遍性比女嬰要高20%。

sentences.english: The second case was a 6-year old male child who died 2 days later.
sentences.chinese: 第二個病例是，一個6週歲的男嬰患病兩天後死亡。

sentences.english: The initial case was a 7-month old male child who recovered from the disease.
sentences.chinese: 最初的病例是，一個7個月的男嬰患病後痊癒。

sentences.english: The normal weight for an 11-month-old boy is around one stone.
sentences.chinese: 一個11月大男嬰的正常體重大約爲14磅。

definition: to disappear without trace/to vanish all of a sudden/to spread fast/to spread like wildfire
to find/to track down/to recover (sth lost)
to pass (sth) on (to sb else)/to transfer sb (to another hospital etc)
